discussion.p: In the overview of locale semantics, paragraph 4, is the sentence

blockquote.p: If Facet is not present in a locale (or, failing that, in the global locale), it throws the standard exception bad_cast.

discussion.p: This is not supported by the definition of use_facet<>, and represents semantics from an old draft.

resolution.p: In , paragraph 4, delete the parenthesized expression

blockquote.p: (or, failing that, in the global locale)
